concrete {crt_grammar_name} of {abs_grammar_name} = {{
  lincat
    Triplet , Subject , Object , Relation , Rel, Entity, Left, Right, {entire_vocab_token_ids_starting_with_tok} = Str;
  lin
    Repeat x y = x ++ ";" ++ y;
    Empty = "EOS";  --[];--
    Build_triplet x y z = x ++ y ++ z ;
    Build_relation x y z = x ++ y ++ z ;
    Build_subject x y z = x ++ y ++ z ;
    Build_object x y z = x ++ y ++ z ;

    Left_bracket = "<" ;
    Right_bracket = ">" ;
    -- the following should be automatically generated --
    {entities_decoding_lin}
    {relations_decoding_lin}
    {tokens_decoding_lin}
}}
